summary.value: Silent steps bring the loudest victories.

system.description:
ALSO: Stalker, Tracker, Trapper

Hunters are masters of the wild, expert trackers, survivalists, and trappers who possess a deep understanding and connection to nature. They respect the cycle of life and often form a symbiotic bond with the creatures they hunt, utilizing the abilities and instincts of their quarry to enhance their own.

While some hunters prefer a nomadic life, others take root and become one with their environment. The Hunter's prowess extends beyond the natural world and can be adapted to any terrain, from populous cities to desolate landscapes.

HUNTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum IP by 2.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons and martial melee weapons.

HUNTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.G3PsZ2JOeBn3tQlL]{Lock-on}

You may use an action and spend 10 Mind Points to lock onto a target. During the next turn, any action taken by an ally against this target gains a +2 bonus to associated checks.

If all checks succeed, the target suffers the weakened condition.

If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points while under the effect of this skill, you may immediately lock onto another target, starting the cycle anew for the next round.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.TiymkOo3y9KboBdt]{Set Trap (SL5)}

Each time you acquire this Skill, you progressively learn better traps. (See below)

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.SszkVbiIJqsMBm8A]{Track (SL5)}

Use an action and spend 10 Mind Points to track prey that is not currently in the scene and whose leads can be followed through conventional, hunter-related means. The target must roll an Opposed 【WLP + INS】 Check against you, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 on this check.

If the tracking is successful, you arrive at the prey’s location. If you decide to start a conflict, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your first Accuracy Check against the prey, and the target suffers 【HR + 15】 damage.

This ability ends if you fall unconscious, attack the prey, choose to track another target, or by Game Master ruling.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mt0XIbBmyKyHeIfB]{Vital Strike}

After a successful Accuracy Check, you may spend 10 Mind Points. The targeted creatures suffer additional damage equal to your 【DEX】 die size. If a creature is already in Crisis, or would enter Crisis with your attack, it also suffers an additional 5 damage.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.92nK16j7z8OveUOE]{Wild Reflexes (SL5)}

When you perform the Guard action, if you choose not to provide cover to another creature, your reflexes are wildly increased. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to your Defense equal to 【SL】.

Additionally, if an enemy misses you with an attack during the effect of this skill, you may perform a free attack against that creature. Treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating the damage dealt by this attack.

TRAPS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-handouts.JournalEntry.y61yipTI0Wnm9xkE.JournalEntryPage.ymijw4JS529Pg8dI]{TRAPS}

Tripwire 【SL 1】
You set up a simple wire attached to two points for detecting physical movement and tripping your target, sounding an alarm when triggered. The target suffers 【HR + 10】 Physical Damage. Describe your contraption and the sound it makes!

Snare Net 【SL 2】
This trap, when triggered, swiftly ensnares the target. The target must spend their first turn escaping the trap.

Poisonous Dart Trap 【SL 3】
You set up a hidden mechanism that, when activated, shoots a concealed dart at the unsuspecting target. The dart is coated with a potent toxin. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 Poison Damage and becomes poisoned.

Bear Trap 【SL 4】
You create a powerful spring-loaded bear trap with razor-sharp teeth, capable of snapping shut on the target's limb. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 Physical Damage and becomes slow.

Explosive Trap 【SL 5】
When triggered, this multi (2) trap releases a concussive explosion. Targets caught in the blast suffer 【HR + 15】 Physical Damage and 【HR + 10】 Fire Damage.
